amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $150,000 earmark for Traditional Arts in Upstate New York in Canton, New York.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in part D of House Report 111-184 to strike the $150,000 earmark for Traditional Arts in Upstate New York in Canton, New York.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 309 (Roll no. 471).
